definition: easy/with no difficulty
light/easy/gentle/soft/reckless/unimportant/frivolous/small in number/unstressed/neutral/to disparage
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
easy/amiable/to change/to exchange/prefix corresponding to the English adjective suffix "-able" or "-ible"
surname Yi/abbr. for 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], the Book of Changes
to lift/to hold up/to cite/to enumerate/to act/to raise/to choose/to elect/act/move/deed
variant of 舉|举[ju3]

sentences.english: He breezed  in with an election plurality of 100,000.
sentences.chinese: 他以10万张的相对多数票轻而易举地获选。

sentences.english: He romped home in the marathon race.
sentences.chinese: 他在马拉松赛跑中轻而易举地获胜。

sentences.english: The question is how they can get chips that easily.
sentences.chinese: 问题是，他们如何能轻而易举的获得芯片。

sentences.english: The Web won’t take the sequestering of its commercial space easily.
sentences.chinese: 互联网不可能轻而易举的将商业空间隔离开来。

sentences.english: Followed the sounds , it is easy to find out that house.
sentences.chinese: 循声而去，便轻而易举地找到了那间屋子。

sentences.english: NNT platform to red within 1 month 2 drilling is easy.
sentences.chinese: 去NNT平台1个月内冲2钻都是轻而易举的。

sentences.english: Paris? Incredible. It is almost too easy.
sentences.chinese: 在巴黎？真巧。这也太轻而易举了吧。

sentences.english: It's easy to love with just words and tongue.
sentences.chinese: 只用讠语和舌头来爱是轻而易举的。

sentences.english: It's easy to find the house by hearing.
sentences.chinese: 循声而去，便轻而易举地找到了那间屋子。

sentences.english: Anti-ageing cream simply won't just do magic to them.
sentences.chinese: 抗衰老面霜不会轻而易举的地对他们施展魔法。

sentences.english: For the first race, the King's horse won very easily.
sentences.chinese: 第一轮，齐王的马赢得轻而易举。

sentences.english: Followed the sound, it is with great ease to find that room.
sentences.chinese: 循声而去，便轻而易举地找到了那间屋子。

sentences.english: Before my accident, I could easily do a headstand .
sentences.chinese: 在我发生意外之前，我可以轻而易举地倒立。

sentences.english: He ran for president and breezed in .
sentences.chinese: 他竞选总统，结果轻而易举地获胜了。

sentences.english: The Web won't take the sequestering of its commercial space easily.
sentences.chinese: 互联网不可能轻而易举的将商业空间隔离开来。
吉姆轻而易举地击败了迪克。

definition: as easy as blowing off dust/effortless/with ease
pinyin: bu4 fei4 chui1 hui1 zhi1 li4

definition: effortless/not expending the slightest effort
easy as a hand's turn (idiom); very easy/no effort at all
stretch a hand and grab it (idiom); very easy
top secret/hush-hush
pinyin: shen2 bu4 zhi1 gui3 bu4 jue2

definition: to accomplish/to get sth done
a small appetizer/a piece of cake; very easy (idiom)
as easy as pie
impossible/can't be done/no can do/unable to accomplish
easily/lightly/rashly
logical/only to be expected/rational and clearly structured (of text)
to be nothing difficult/to be a cinch
to think about it
to be a cinch/in the bag/(of a person) confident of success
lunatic ravings/nonsense/pipe dream
wordless and uncommunicative (idiom); without speaking/taciturn/not providing any news
